section.name: Arabel the Mystic
section.p: Arabel is the seventh daughter of a seventh daughter, and her mystic powers are her birthright. Driven by visions of her fate, she seeks to master all forms of magical lore. She has heard of a mysterious island, inhabited by wizards, where she might further her knowledge.
You can play as Arabel, or as a mage with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
